BAḪAR₂ 𒁃 ≈ 𒂔 BAḪAR₂ potter 𒁇𒂔 baḫar₃ 𒌋𒂔 baḫar₄ "potter" po'er (British)
bahar 𒄞 "potter" !?

𓐪 𓂧 𓏌 | potter (as epitaph of Khnum) | POTTER ++ poddur / ⇔ hort
𓐪 𓂧 𓏌 | use the potter's wheel |
𓐪 𓂧 𓏌 | pot |

𓊪 𓂧 𓏏 𓌒 𓌙 𓀀 𓏥 | (collective n.) foreigners | potter @ Phoini/Punt? pɨtaɣʷa@Guaraní bakˀo@Hausa

𓅘 𓎛 𓊪 𓊌 | potter's wheel |

𓂡 | use the potter's wheel |

ⲕⲉⲣⲁⲙⲉⲩⲥ , ⲕⲉⲣⲁⲙⲉⲱⲥ 🇬🇷 m. potter, maker of pottery
ⲕⲉⲣⲁⲙⲉⲱⲥ ↔ ⲕⲉⲣⲁⲙⲉⲩⲥ potter

𓈎 𓂋 𓂋 𓊮 | fire (pottery), broil (food) | grill / garen / kocher ⇔ kuchen ⇔ cook ⇔ ceramik !! +++
𓈎 𓂋 𓂋 𓍔 | fire (pottery), broil (food) | qur@Thai qvire > fire

ⲃⲉⲗϫ fm. pottery, earthenware
ⲉⲣⲃⲉⲗϫ ↔ to be made of pottery
